lcs_not_ready_cli: The LCS is not ready to handle requests just yet. Please wait a moment and try again.
url_b64_cli: URL provided to /lookup must be base64 encoded.
corrupt_json_err: The formatting of the data retrieved was found to not be valid JSON.
no_config_cli: Could not read configuration file at {{.Location}}.
got_request_msg_cli: Got a request for {{.URL}}.  Was rewritten? {{.Rewritten}}.
no_articles_file_err: No article listing file could be found for the feed you tried to access.
contact_devs_err: Email ceno@equalit.ie with the details of the error that has occurred.
agent_communication_err: Check that all of the components of CENO are running. You may wish to restart the CENO box entirely.
no_articles_advice: Wait for the file to become available. You may want to browse another channel in the meantime.
unrecognized_error_code: {{.ErrCode}} is not a recognized error code.
malformed_url_err: Check that you have entered the URL of the site you want to visit correctly.
how_to_default_cfg: You can press enter/return without entering anything else to use the default.
download_package_err: Download the view and config package and unpack its contents into ceno-client/views/.
undisc_page_errmsg_cfg: Error message for pages that could not be found [{{.Default}}]:
unable_close_response_body: LCS did not serve a complete response.
please_wait_txt: The page you have requested is being prepared. Please refresh this page in a few moments to check if it's ready.
querystring_no_url_cli: No URL provided in query string.
listening_msg_cli: CENO proxy server listening for HTTP requests at http://127.0.0.1{{.Port}}.
lcs_not_ready_err: Wait a minute or two before making your request again.
please_wait_p2_html: Please wait patiently and you will be redirected when it is ready.
provide_new_settings_cfg: Please provide new settings using the format of the examples provided to configure CENO.
missing_config_err: A configuration file for the client could not be found.
no_reach_lcs_cli: Could not reach the local cache server to report decode error.
lcs_lookup_failure_err: Check that the LCS and CENO Freenet plugin are running correctly and that peers are connected or wait for this page to refresh when everything is ready.
incorrect_data_cfg: Some data was entered incorrectly. Please try again.
portal_blurb: The CENO portal service gives you direct access to selected content, presented in an approachable way, as soon as you get started. That means no long wait for new content and a seamless first-time experience.
no_feeds_file_err: No feeds file was found to get a list of available RSS/Atom feeds from.
please_wait_p1_html: The page you requested is being prepared.
